body:
"You do not have permission to view this topic." (it is about "LFM Apollo")
Oh, if so, Iron, here is my answer.
You said, there is deference, cause it is block game. But players are REAL, they have real feelings, real brains, and they really dont understand why.
And most of them are children, their minds are vulnerable
When you apply for staff, do they answer you? Yes? What a surprise!
And read this https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Freedom_of_speech
